about_the_game: This expansion pack sends for Gil's Secret Library — a rare collection of Gil's journal, historical books, a manuscript, and recordings — providing a rare, in-depth backstory and compelling historical and archaeological details you will encounter in Riddle of the Sphinx™ The Awakening.
detailed_description: This expansion pack sends for Gil's Secret Library — a rare collection of Gil's journal, historical books, a manuscript, and recordings — providing a rare, in-depth backstory and compelling historical and archaeological details you will encounter in Riddle of the Sphinx™ The Awakening.

fullgame.name: Riddle of the Sphinx™ The Awakening (Enhanced Edition)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.4GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536 MB
  • Sound Card: Standard
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro Vega 20 4 GB
  • Sound Card: Standard

name: Riddle of the Sphinx™ (DLC) Secret Library

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Riddle of the Sphinx™ - Gil's Secret Library - $2.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Riddle of the Sphinx™ (DLC) Secret Library

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Sound Card: Standard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Standard

short_description: This expansion pack sends for Gil's Secret Library — a rare collection of Gil's journal, historical books, a manuscript, and recordings — providing in-depth backstory and compelling historical and archaeological details you will encounter in Riddle of the Sphinx™ The Awakening.
